item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

doomsday:

why good does this do???

It is a failsafe way of CLiking on the MiniMap color.

If it cannot find it at first, then it will increase the tolerance until the color is found…

item.title: A Function I made a long time ago
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Hey everyone,

I made this Function a while ago, it could or couldn’t be useful but here it is anyway 

Finds the color, if not, uses a tolerance riser

[CODE]Function ClickMMColor(Color :integer; MaxTol : Integer): Boolean;
Var Tol : integer;

Begin
for Tol:= 0 to MaxTol do
Begin
Result:= FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color,574,8,724,157,Tol);
if(Result)then
Clickmouse(x,y,1);
Wait(500+random(10/255/52));
Flag;
Wait(101+random(6/212/56));
Exit;
end;
end;[/CODE]

Replace Clickmouse and Flag to whichever Mouse/Flag Function you wish to use.

Cheers,
Surajd.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 20, 2006, 04:49:21 am[/size][hr]Does it help find Colors better with the new update?

Read full topic
